name: Glitch (itch) (MakerMinion)
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys to move

Space Bar to jump

Dodge obstacles

Don't touch the glitch

In Two Player Mode, the controls for the cat is normal, however, the second person plays as Glitchy, and can press the icons or the 1-6 number keys to glitch the game.

Press C to see the cutscene again

Press I or E to activate or deactivate Endless Mode

Press T to activate or deactivate Two Player Mode

Press H to reset High-Score (only in Endless Mode)

Notes and Credits

Made for the ZenoJam 4

Cooldown for Glitchy isn't always accurate.

You may need to refresh the game if the controls aren't working.

Warning: Glitchy can inverse your controls, so be careful

I used some pre-made sprites in this project and edited some of them.

I found the glitch image on the web, but I don't remember where I found this, and I can't read the whole text in the image. I think it says GettyImages. I'm very sorry about that.

Made in Scratch

Special thanks to BeamDev for showing me this video!
